UD_ModTrigger_CombatEvent
Scriptname UD_ModTrigger_CombatEvent extends UD_ModTrigger

It triggers on combat event(s)

NameFull: On Combat Event

Parameters in DataStr

[0]  String  Combat event to trigger (one or several abbreviations separated by space) WS - Weapon Swing SC - Spell Cast SF - Spell Fire VC - Voice Cast VF - Voice Fire BD - Bow Draw BR - Bow Release UB - Unsheathe Begin (doesn't fire with spells) UE - Unsheathe End SB - Sheathe Begin (doesn't fire with spells) SE - Sheathe End

[1]  Float  Base probability to trigger on event (in %) Default value: 100.0%

Example
VF,25

The trigger will be triggered with 25% probability when voice is used

Events Processing
User interface
Protected Methods
